name: Lost In Translation
description:
Lost In Translation is an Educational Thriller designed to teach players French in an uniquely engaging way. The game plays similarly to many horror survival games except with the rather arbitrary puzzles replaced with actually educational ones. Players are guided through the game with French dialog and instructions.

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to jump

Mouse click to interact with objects

You also have a phrasebook on the bottom left corner of your screen; French phrases are automatically recorded here as they are heard. You can provide your own translations here for your own reference throughout the game.

System Requirements:

Dual Core or better CPU

Windows 7

Mouse and keyboard
